definitions: (of a passenger) issued with a travel ticket

examples.text: only ticketed passengers are allowed through security

definitions: issued with an official notice of a traffic offense

examples.text: ticketed drivers should be more willing to accept their punishment and pay up

shortDefinitions: issued with official notice of traffic offence

definitions: denoting an event for which a ticket is required to attend
shortDefinitions: denoting event for which ticket is required to atend

definitions: (of a retail product) marked with a label giving its price, size, and other details
denoting the price or other details given on a label with which a retail product is marked
shortDefinitions: denoting price given on label of retail product
